div.span: Due to Southeast Polk schools remaining closed through the remainder of the school year, we've launched a new site for all SEP students and families to access Southeast Polkâ€™s Continuous Learning Plans. div.span: Preschool Registration Opens February 4 at 5 p.m.

div.p: Register Beginning Tuesday, Feb. 4, 2020 at 5 p.m.

Preschool registration will be available online beginning February 4, 2020, at 5 p.m. Southeast Polk uses online registration (OLR) to register students. We hope you will find this process convenient and time-saving. We ask that you complete OLR during the month of February, which will allow our staff to complete the placement process in a timely manner. Please register/update ALL students, in your family when registering your preschooler.
